name: plink-ng

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A comprehensive update to the PLINK association analysis toolset.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
Arm Performance Libraries provides optimized standard core math
libraries for high-performance computing applications on Arm processors.

dependencies.name: cblas
dependencies.description:
The BLAS (Basic Linear Algebra Subprograms) are routines that provide
standard building blocks for performing basic vector and matrix
operations.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
libflame is a portable library for dense matrix computations, providing
much of the functionality present in LAPACK, developed by current and
former members of the Science of High-Performance Computing (SHPC) group
in the Institute for Computational Engineering and Sciences at The
University of Texas at Austin. libflame includes a compatibility layer,
lapack2flame, which includes a complete LAPACK implementation.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.

dependencies.name: zstd
dependencies.description:
Zstandard, or zstd as short version, is a fast lossless compression
algorithm, targeting real-time compression scenarios at zlib-level and
better compression ratios.
